Executes marketing strategies for public relations, social media and digital advertising, writes brand style guides, website copy, brand collateral, articles, public relations materials and blogs, distributes press releases, media alerts and pitches to traditional media and non-traditional blog and digital outlets, creates custom graphic design for social media posts, cover photos, email marketing and digital advertisements, writes, creates and distributes email marketing campaigns, manages and organically grows social media outlets, buys digital advertising for Yelp, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and Google Adwords, builds, updates and manages Wordpress, Squarespace and Wix websites.
Public Relations, Digital Marketing, Social Media Marketing, Blogging & Writing

recommendations: Brand Strategist, Content Creator, Author, Editor, Relaxation Curator
February 14, 2013, Carolyn reported directly to Lisa

Working with Lisa Kasanicky since 2007, she has not only been an employer, but also a mentor to me. I started working for AZ Spa Girls as a college intern and continued with the company after graduation. Without any editorial or marketing experience, Lisa took me under her wing and taught me everything I know, from writing to social media and beyond. Her time and patience has been indispensible to my career and I would not be where I am professionally today without her. Lisa empowered me to explore many sides of her business and gave me the opportunity to not only write, but also assist in marketing efforts, social media, large event planning and intern hiring and management. Lisa has truly shaped me both professionally and personally and given me the confidence to explore and grow in areas of business I never thought I could. Six years later, I am still a contributing writer for AZ Spa Girls and frequently reach out to Lisa for editorial and career advice. Whether just starting out as an intern or a seasoned writer, marketing, or social media pro, Lisa sees the potential in her employees and goes above and beyond to ensure their personal growth and success.

summary: Founder and Digital Strategist at Fayte Marketing, a boutique public relations, social media and branding company located in Phoenix, AZ. Carolyn’s writing has been published in local publications including Arizona Weddings Magazine and ArizonaSpaGirls.com. She has also worked on national PR campaigns landing clients in The New York Times, Shape, Extra, Chicago Tribune, Mens Health, Mens Fitness, Mashable, Huffington Post, Lonny Magazine, NBC’s Open House and more.Client experience includes: yurbuds Sport Earphones, State Forty Eight, Mojix, Adler Grier, Dig It Urban Garden, Grimaldi's, Valley of the Sun YMCA (16 branches), RLC Labs, Pacific Links International, Skye Canyon, Kimpton Hotels, US Airways, Scottsdale Quarter, Jamie Herzlinger Interiors, Truce Clean, OrthoArizona, Papa Murphy’s International, 3TV Phoenix 10K and more.
